title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed correctly in the Data Explorer view.
OB: When connecting a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons are missing in the Edit Data Set window.
EB: When connecting a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons should be displayed in the Edit Data Set window.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database using the following details:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select the Query option.
